Summary: Bright red/ orange light. Thought it was Mars but too low in the sky and started moving.
divs: sighting detailsmy daughter and i were on our deck with our binoculars looking at airplanes flying by. we are frequent sky watchers. at around 9:10pm we saw a very bright reddish orange light in the east. at first i thought it was probably a planet like mars, but the light seemed too low and bright to be that. it seemed to be getting gradually larger (i think it was heading toward us). there were very distinct red and orange color, with no noise and no blinking\ strobing. after watching this for about a minute, the object began strobing a very bright white light. i watched it for about another minute and the light just faded out and i couldn't see it anymore. there were no trees obstructing my view.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Shrewsbury
There were no other sightings in Shrewsbury on or around July 13th 2009
